item.title: Celebrating the 75th anniversary of the Hoover Dam.

latestAction.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

item.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S7666-7669; text as passed Senate: CR S7667; text of measure as introduced: CR S7636-7637)

Passed/agreed to in Senate: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.(consideration: CR S7666-7669; text as passed Senate: CR S7667; text of measure as introduced: CR S7636-7637)

summary.text: Celebrates the 75th anniversary of the dedication of the Hoover Dam.

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)

Celebrates the 75th anniversary of the dedication of the Hoover Dam.

Recognizes the benefits of the construction of that dam to the agricultural, industrial, and urban development of the Southwestern United States.

bill.title: A resolution celebrating the 75th anniversary of the dedication of the Hoover Dam.

item.title: A resolution celebrating the 75th anniversary of the dedication of the Hoover Dam.
A resolution celebrating the 75th anniversary of the dedication of the Hoover Dam.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
